module.name: CallerID Lookup
module.description: Allows CallerID Lookup of incoming calls against different sources (OpenCNAM, MySQL, HTTP, ENUM, Phonebook Module)
module.changelog: *2.12.0.1* Allows to set any variables instead of just Callerid name *2.12.0.0* Newer GUI, standarize module components *2.11.1.12* Initial Issabel Foundation release
